refnamediv.refpurpose: lengths of the beginning of strings as long as characters are among those allowed

listitem.para: Matrices of strings, of identical dimensions. allowedChars can be a scalar string. It is then used for all Strings components.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: headsLengths = strspn(Strings, allowedChars) returns the length of the initial portion of Strings which consists only of characters that are part of allowedChars.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting:
allowed = "0":"9" strspn("129th or the 130th", allowed)
t = ["characters" "matrix" ; "text" "strings"] allowed = "a":"s" strspn(t, allowed)
allowed = ["a":"j", "a":"u" ; "d":"u", "g":"v"] strspn(t, allowed)
